title: Verify: Selecting WWE Network app icon successfully opens the WWE Network HTML 5 app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their HTML 5 device
AND the "WWE Network" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects WWE Network from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the WWE Network app will open successfully

title: Verify: WWE Network can be accessed while the HTML5 device is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their HTML 5 device
AND their HTML 5 device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND the "WWE Network" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects WWE Network from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the WWE Network app will open successfully

title: Verify: WWE Network can be accessed while the HTML5 device is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their HTML 5 device
AND the "WWE Network" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects WWE Network from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the WWE Network app will open successfully

Monthly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the WWE Network app has been accessed
AND a Monthly WWE Network User account has been purchased/entitled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a Monthly WWE Network User account (upon Login request)
AND enters the Monthly WWE Network User account password
custom_expected: THE Monthly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application

title: Monthly account entitlement is allowed to play Live Linear and/or VOD archive content items
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the WWE Network app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Monthly account entitlemenet
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any graphical icon that contains Content Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for Game Content Assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the WWE Network media content
custom_expected: THE Monthly account entitlement is allowed to play Live Linear and/or VOD archive content items

title: Functionality: Menu Scrolling (Navigate Menu Button)
Functionality: Select Button
Functionality: Return/Back Button
Verify: Clicking BACK on the remote yields the Quit message box
Verify: Clicking ON NOW button brings up the WATCH box
Verify: Clicking SHOWS opens the SHOWS menu
Verify: Clicking SCHEDULE opens the SCHEDULE menu
Verify: Clicking SEARCH opens the SEARCH menu
Verify: Clicking MY ACCOUNT opens the MY ACCOUNT menu
Verify: Image for ON NOW program flips with each program change
Verify: Carousel at bottom of Home screen can be scrolled through
Verify: Activating Continue Watching tile on carousel opens Continue Watching menu
Verify: Activating Watching tile on carousel opens Watchlist
Verify: Watchlist menu displays 'No Content Available' if Watchlist is empty
Verify: Continue Watching menu displays 'No Content Available'if Continue Watching menu is empty
Verify: Continue Watching menu opens with at least one piece of content present in the menu
Verify: Continue Watching menu cannot be opened when no content is present in the menu
Verify All available Settings options are visible and accessible in the sub-menu display
Verify Continue Watching functionality
Verify Watchlist sub-menu functionality
Verify Parental Controls sub-menu functionality
Verify Log-Out/Log-In sub-menu functionality (from Settings Menu)
Verify Parental Controls Icon Highlight Functionality (Copy and Boundary box placement)
Verify Parental Controls Icon initiation into Sub-Menu Functionality
Results: Verify Results Auto Update based on Keyword
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we access the Search section
custom_steps: WHEN "cena" is entered into the Search field
custom_expected:
THEN the text "John Cena" is offered in auto-complete suggestions
AND can be activated 

Updated 8/17/15 to reflect Search Standardization requirements for Sep. 2015
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/PSOL/WWE+-+Search+Standardization+-+Sept+2015

title: Results: Verify Multiple Results Can Be Scrolled Through
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we access the Search section
custom_steps: WHEN "royal rumble" is entered into the Search field
custom_expected:
THEN user can scroll through multiple Royal Rumble auto-complete suggestions 
AND "Royal Rumble 2015" appears and can be activated 


Updated 8/17/15 to reflect Search Standardization requirements for Sep. 2015
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/PSOL/WWE+-+Search+Standardization+-+Sept+2015

title: Results: Freeform Queries (No Keyword Match) Can Be Searched
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we access the Search section
custom_steps:
WHEN the user inputs "cena vs rock" into the Search Field
AND submits query (even though the term doesn't match against a keyword)
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be presented with approx. 13 related search results

Updated 8/17/15 to reflect Search Standardization requirements for Sep. 2015
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/PSOL/WWE+-+Search+Standardization+-+Sept+2015

title: Verify: clicking PCON icon opens up Parental control PIN menu
Verify: when PCON is turned ON the icon is green
Verify: when PCON is turned OFF the icon is white
Verify: inputting incorrect pin yields Invalid PIN message
Verify: Inputting correct PIN updates the PCON status
Verify: Inputting correct PIN to update PCON status removes PIN entry display from screen
Verify: Successfully updating PIN yields "Parental Controls successfully updated." message
Verify: WWE Network application loads Spanish Menu/UI text
Verify: WWE Network application loads French Menu/UI text
Verify: WWE Network application can be returned to English Menu/UI text
Verify All available Settings options are visible and accessible in the sub-menu display
Verify Continue Watching functionality
Verify Watchlist sub-menu functionality
Verify Parental Controls sub-menu functionality
Verify Log-Out/Log-In sub-menu functionality (from Settings Menu)
Verify Parental Controls Icon Highlight Functionality (Copy and Boundary box placement)
Verify Parental Controls Icon initiation into Sub-Menu Functionality
Wired Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the WWE Network HTML5 device connected to a wired network connection
AND the user has accessed the "WWE Network" Application
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER locates any media content file
AND the USER attempts to play ANY media content file
custom_expected:
THEN the media video stream will launch successfully
AND the media content file will play without issue

title: Wireless Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the WWE Network HTML5 device connected to a wireless network connection
AND the user has accessed the "WWE Network" Application
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER locates any media content file
AND the USER attempts to play ANY media content file
custom_expected:
THEN the media video stream will launch successfully
AND the media content file will play without issue

title: Full VOD Archive Playback to Exit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "WWE Network" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Monthly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch ANY ARCHIVE/VOD video feed with a TRT > 2mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will return to Schedule (asset) page

title: Live Linear Media Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "WWE Network" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Monthly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch ANY LIVE video feed with a TRT > 2mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly

title: Seek FWD to Exit - VOD Archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "WWE Network" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Monthly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER launches a VOD Archive video feed
AND seek to the END of video
custom_expected: THEN the video will transition from playback and return to the Schedule (asset) page gracefully

title: Seek BACK (RWD) to Front of Program
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "WWE Network" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Monthly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER launches a VOD Archive video feed
AND seek FWD > 10 mins into program
AND allow > 30 secs of playback
AND seek BACK (RWD) to head of program
custom_expected: THEN the video will resume playback from beginning and continue without issue

title: Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations
Network: Verify video quality improves with connectivity improvement
Network: Verify when throttling connection strength that bitrate playback adjusts without issue in both directions
PP: At the end of a VOD playback, the user is greeted with a post screen with either the next episode or live linear
PP: User is greeted with the next episode when watching an original series or a collection that isn't the latest episode.
PP: The Post-Play screen displays the live linear feed for every other VOD that isn't an original series or collection
PP: The Post-Play screen displays a "more episodes" button that, when accessed, will direct the user to the show's carousel
custom_preconds: This case only pertains to episodes that have a show associated with them.

title: PP: User should be able to return to the video asset detail page if said User presses the return button

title: Video Playback: Wired Connection Lost ***
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is successfully playing full screen
AND the HTML5 device is connected to a wired network connection
custom_steps: WHEN we disconnect the LAN from the wall
custom_expected: THEN the expected fail message appears

title: Video Playback: Wireless Connection Lost ***
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is successfully playing full screen
AND the HTML5 device is connected to an Ad Hoc wifi network
custom_steps: WHEN we turn off the Ad Hoc wifi network
custom_expected: THEN the expected fail message appears

title: Video Playback: Wireless Connection - No Data (Blocked) ***
custom_preconds: ATV/Proxy network setup and set up test scenario when data is choked

title: Verify Multi-language does not appear on PPV Detail Page during Live Linear Stream (Pre-Show)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Pay Per View Category row
custom_steps: WHEN we select the PPV Live Linear Stream
custom_expected:
THEN the PPV Show Page will open
AND the Show's title will appear 
AND the episode's metadata will appear beneath the Show title 
AND the Show's Air Time and Duration will appear
AND the Watch Live button will appear
AND the Watch from Beginning button will appear
AND the Add Episode button will appear
AND the Add Series button will appear
AND a Change Language button will NOT appear

title: Verify Multi-language does not appear on the Live Linear Stream (Pre-Show)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we navigate to the PPV Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate the PPV Live Linear Stream
AND we launch the PPV Live Linear Stream
AND the user brings up the Video Player
custom_expected: THEN there will not be any Multi-Language option.

custom_expected:

AND the Show's Air Time and Duration will appear
AND the Watch Live button will appear
AND the Watch from Beginning button will appear
AND the Add Episode button will appear
AND the Add Series button will appear
AND a Change Language button will NOT appear

title: Verify all supported languages are listed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN WWE is installed
AND User is logged in with an entitled account
custom_steps: WHEN User selects the Multi-Language option on PPV Detail page
custom_expected:
THEN the list of available languages should consist of the following 8 languages (when available)
English
Spanish
Brazilian Portuguese
German
Russian
Japanese
Hindi
Mandarin

title: Verify user is able to scroll up and down Preferred Languages list on Language menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN WWE is installed
AND User is logged in with an entitled account
AND User has begun Live Linear
custom_steps:
WHEN User taps on Multi-Language option on video Player
AND taps Audio Language
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be able to scroll up and down through the language list

FOR ATV LEGACY:
Please mark this as N/A for ATV Legacy as it does NOT support in-player settings

AND User is logged in with an entitled account
AND User is on the PPV Detail Page
custom_steps:

AND selects Audio Language
custom_expected: THEN the user should be able to select a language in the list
